      • Order

        public Order(long id,
             double price,
             double priceDiscount,
             java.lang.String clientName,
             boolean isPaid,
             java.sql.Date date,
             java.util.ArrayList<OrderProduct> productList)
        get an order from database or create an order directly.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the new order
        price - the initial price of the order
        priceDiscount - the price discounted of the order
        clientName - the name of the client
        isPaid - is the order paid
        date - date of the order creation
        productList - the IDs of the order's products
